availability_constraints: Single point of failure for all infrastructure tasks.
skill_development_goals: Advanced Kubernetes security, Cost optimization strategies in AWS.
risk_mitigation: Document all infrastructure setup and deployment processes in a runbook. Cross-train a backend developer on basic deployment and monitoring.
alternative_allocation: Can be augmented with an external consultant for specific high-complexity tasks like EKS networking.

availability_constraints: Key person dependency for complex integrations like GSP.
skill_development_goals: Asynchronous job patterns, Advanced Odoo performance tuning.
risk_mitigation: Pair programming with backend.dev2 on the GSP integration task to share knowledge.
alternative_allocation: Can offload simpler model creation tasks to backend.dev2 to focus on architecture.

availability_constraints: Learning curve for new technologies like FastAPI.
skill_development_goals: FastAPI microservice architecture, Real-time data processing.
risk_mitigation: Will lead the FastAPI microservice development but with close guidance from the Tech Lead to mitigate learning curve risks.
alternative_allocation: Focuses on core Odoo model and business logic, allowing the senior to handle complex integrations.

availability_constraints: Single point of failure for all specialized frontend work.
skill_development_goals: Integrating external JS libraries with OWL, Real-time UI updates.
risk_mitigation: Thoroughly document OWL component patterns and best practices for potential future frontend developers.
alternative_allocation: Can take on additional UI/UX refinement tasks given the available buffer.
